content:
Hi,

On micro quiz 3 I received a 52%. My scoring was as follows:

1: 2/4

2: 1.2/4

3: 2/2

For Q1, the only issue was that I added the key instead of the value of d on my second to last line, causing only 1 test case to fail. Changing this one part(to ans.append(Lk[i])), I would have gotten full credit. 

For Q2, I simply forgot to increment by 1 for i in my innermost loop and had an index out of bound which I could fix by adding i < len(keys) and instead of d[keys[i]] += freq, d[keys[i-1]] += freq

My logic was correct for both questions, but I had very small errors which lead to failing test cases. Could I have a regrade for those two questions please?

Thanks
subject: Microquiz 3 Regrade

content: We just took another look at your quiz answers and updated the score.
